sense.gloss: fixing (in place), being fixed (in place), securing, anchoring, fastening down
fixing (e.g. salary, capital), keeping the same
user name (on an online forum like 2ch where the majority of users post anonymously)
user of an online handle (instead of posting anonymously)
characteristic, traditional, peculiar, inherent, native, eigen-
lump, mass, bundle, clump, clod, cluster
embodiment (of an idea, quality, feeling etc.), personification
strong, firm (not viscous or easily moved)
sticking to (an opinion, theory, belief, etc.), clinging to, adherence, persistence, insistence
to harden, to freeze, to strengthen, to solidify, to make (a fist), to tramp down (snow, dirt)
x: 土を固める・つちをかためる

sense.gloss: to put together, to collect, to gather, to consolidate
to make secure, to stabilize, to settle down, to strengthen (belief, resolution, etc.), to establish (evidence)
x: 身を固める・みをかためる・1

sense.gloss: to fortify, to reinforce, to support
x: 国境を固める・こっきょうをかためる
嘘で固める・うそでかためる

sense.gloss: to wear for a specific purpose (armor, coat, etc.)
to swear, to resolutely vow, to sincerely promise
to hold a bow fully drawn
to become firm, to become certain
to gather (together), to assemble, to huddle together
fixed idea, idée fixe, stereotype, prejudice
somewhat hard, somewhat firm, fairly hard, on the hard side
obstinate, stubborn, obdurate, headstrong, willful, perverse

r_ele.r: あめふってじかたまる

sense.gloss: adversity strengthens the foundations, after a storm comes a calm, what doesn't kill you makes you stronger, the ground hardens after it rains
to fabricate a web of lies
to coagulate, to curdle, to clot
to be fanatical, to be obsessed with, to be bigoted
hardening point, freezing point, congealing point
blood clotting, blood coagulation, coagulation, coagulant
from the beginning, from the first, all along, originally
not to mention ..., not only ... but also ..., to say nothing of ...
adherence (to one's beliefs), persistence, sticking to one's guns, standing one's ground
to hold one's breath (in fear, anxiety, etc.)

r_ele.r: こていちょうブロック

sense.gloss: stubbornly sticking to old ways, dislike of new things, narrow-mindedness

sdata.j: チーズは、ウシ、ヤギ、ヒツジやその↑他↑↓た↓の↑哺乳類↑↓ほにゅうるい↓の↑乳↑↓ちち↓から↑作↑↓つく↓られる↑固形↑↓こけい↓の↑食↑↓た↓べ↑物↑↓もの↓だ。
sdata.e: Cheese is a solid food made from the milk of cows, goats, sheep, and other mammals.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑断固↑↓だんこ↓として↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑要求↑↓ようきゅう↓を↑拒絶↑↓きょぜつ↓すべきであった。
sdata.e: You should have refused his request flatly.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑主張↑↓しゅちょう↓は、ぼくの↑頑固↑↓がんこ↓↑親父↑↓おやじ↓のと↑同↑↓おな↓じく↑納得↑↓なっとく↓できない。
sdata.e: Your argument is not any more convincing than that of my stubborn father.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓がいくら↑笑↑↓わら↓っても、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓はあくまでも↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑案↑↓あん↓を↑固守↑↓こしゅ↓します。
sdata.e: Laugh as much as you like; I'll stick to my plan to the bitter end.

sdata.j: ↑牛乳↑↓ぎゅうにゅう↓は↑凍↑↓こお↓って↑固↑↓かた↓まった。
sdata.e: The milk froze and became solid.

sdata.j: ↑喫煙↑↓きつえん↓が↑健康↑↓けんこう↓に↑悪↑↓わる↓いと↑言↑↓い↓う↑確固↑↓かっこ↓たる↑証拠↑↓しょうこ↓がある。
sdata.e: We have absolute proof that smoking is bad for your health.

sdata.j: ↑気宇↑↓きう↓↑壮大↑↓そうだい↓な↑計画↑↓けいかく↓もいいけれど、まずは↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑足元↑↓あしもと↓を↑固↑↓かた↓めることから↑始↑↓はじ↓めてほしいよ。
sdata.e: It's fine to make grandiose plans, but I'd like you to start with what you have on your plate.

sdata.j: ↑基礎↑↓きそ↓を↑固↑↓かた↓めることは↑大切↑↓たいせつ↓です。
sdata.e: It is important to strengthen the basis.

sdata.j: ↑頑固↑↓がんこ↓↑一↑↓いち↓↑徹↑↓てっ↓のボスだと↑思↑↓おも↓っていたけれど、↑結構↑↓けっこう↓かわいいところもあるじゃない。
sdata.e: I thought our boss was stubborn as a mule but actually he has his cute side.

sdata.j: ↑頑固↑↓がんこ↓になればなるほど↑独立↑↓どくりつ↓するよ。
sdata.e: The more stubborn you are, the more isolated you become.

sdata.j: ↑頑固↑↓がんこ↓になればなるほど↑孤立↑↓こりつ↓するよ。
sdata.e: If it becomes stubborn indeed it stands alone.

sdata.j: ↑頑固↑↓がんこ↓にならず、↑人↑↓ひと↓と↑仲良↑↓なかよ↓くすることです。
sdata.e: You should be friendly rather than stubborn.

sdata.j: ↑頑固↑↓がんこ↓なのは↑父↑↓ちち↓↑譲↑↓ゆず↓りだ。
sdata.e: I've got my stubbornness from my father.

sdata.j: ↑官僚↑↓かんりょう↓↑達↑↓たち↓は↑大↑↓だい↓↑企業↑↓きぎょう↓との↑強固↑↓きょうこ↓な↑関係↑↓かんけい↓を↑維持↑↓いじ↓している。
sdata.e: The bureaucrats maintain solid ties with the gigantic corporations.

sdata.j: ↑階級↑↓かいきゅう↓↑組織↑↓そしき↓は↑長↑↓なが↓い↑間↑↓ま↓↑固定↑↓こてい↓されてきた。
sdata.e: The hierarchy of rank has long been fixed.

sdata.j: ↑海↑↓うみ↓の↑氷↑↓こおり↓はきわめて↑変↑↓か↓わりやすい——↑寒↑↓さむ↓く↑風↑↓かぜ↓のない↑天候↑↓てんこう↓のときは↑固↑↓かた↓く↑凍↑↓こお↓っているが、↑嵐↑↓あらし↓のときは↑外洋↑↓がいよう↓の↑広↑↓ひろ↓い↑水域↑↓すいいき↓で↑割↑↓わ↓れてしまう。
sdata.e: The sea ice is highly variable - frozen solid during cold, calm weather and broken up in large areas of open water during storms.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑我々↑↓われわれ↓の↑計画↑↓けいかく↓に↑固執↑↓こしつ↓するべきだ。
sdata.e: We should stick to our plan.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓の↑計画↑↓けいかく↓はまだ↑固↑↓かた↓まってない。
sdata.e: Our plans are not yet concrete.

sdata.j: ↑家↑↓いえ↓は↑堅固↑↓けんご↓なセメントの↑基盤↑↓きばん↓の↑上↑↓じょう↓に↑建↑↓た↓てられる。
sdata.e: A house is built on top of a solid foundation of cement.

sdata.j: ↑羽↑↓はね↓は↑鳥↑↓とり↓に↑固有↑↓こゆう↓のものだ。
sdata.e: Feathers are peculiar to birds.

sdata.j: ↑医師↑↓いし↓の↑警告↑↓けいこく↓で↑禁酒↑↓きんしゅ↓の↑決意↑↓けつい↓が↑固↑↓かた↓くなった。
sdata.e: The doctor's warning stiffened my resolve to stop drinking.

sdata.j: わたしは↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑無実↑↓むじつ↓を↑固↑↓かた↓く↑信↑↓しん↓じている。
sdata.e: I have a firm belief in his innocence.

sdata.j: もう↑身↑↓み↓を↑固↑↓かた↓めて↑落↑↓お↓ち↑着↑↓つ↓いてもいいころだよ。
sdata.e: It's high time you got married and settled down.

sdata.j: メアリーはとても↑頑固↑↓がんこ↓で、↑謝↑↓あやま↓ることを↑知↑↓し↓らない。
sdata.e: Mary is too stubborn to apologize.

sdata.j: どうぞ↑固↑↓かた↓くならないで↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Please don't stand on ceremony.

sdata.j: テニスのラケットを↑固↑↓かた↓く↑握↑↓にぎ↓った。
sdata.e: He gripped the tennis racket tightly.

sdata.j: それは↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓↑固有↑↓こゆう↓の↑習慣↑↓しゅうかん↓だ。
sdata.e: That is a custom proper to Japan.

sdata.j: それは↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑固定↑↓こてい↓↑観念↑↓かんねん↓だよ。
sdata.e: It's your stereotyping.

sdata.j: その↑問題↑↓もんだい↓はこのシステムに↑固有↑↓こゆう↓のものだ。
sdata.e: The problems are inherent in this system.

sdata.j: その↑装置↑↓そうち↓は↑天井↑↓てんじょう↓にしっかりと↑固定↑↓こてい↓されている。
sdata.e: The device is attached fast to the ceiling.
